comment: There is a skyscraper in the distance with a man walking in front of the camera .
Someone is holding a young women on their shoulders for her to be able to reach the area she would like to use a wire brush to scrape off peeling paint .
A young woman draped in a wool shawl intently spinning wool outdoors in early Spring .
A man in an orange shirt is using a scraper in a sifter .
Beautiful brunette woman , draped in purple , blue and a scarlet scarves .
Two men trying to scrape the cement from the floor to level it .
A group of seven people are eating at a table draped in a black tablecloth .
A child sleeps on a couch with his mouth open and his hand draped across his chest .
A young woman in a black blouse , blue jeans , and sandals is standing behind another young woman who is seated with a red poncho draped around her as the first young lady cuts her hair .
An intimate setting with low lighting , draped doors and tables with small groups of men and women smiling and drinking .
A young man in a group band playing a French Horn , with other musicians all around and large gold drapery in the background .
A man sits behind a decorated table inside a room with fabrics draped down the walls .
The young toddler in the striped shirt eats grapes and a banana as an afternoon snack at his grandmas .
Two men in orange clothing and hard hats oversee a scraper as it works on repairing a road .
A blond , Caucasian female , wearing a white business jacket , pink blouse , sitting at a table draped in hot pink tablecloth , writing on a piece of paper .
A Spanish guitarist and a female performer clad in white look on while a female student dons a serape .
A man sitting in a wicker chair in a white room with one arm draped over the back of the chair , chuckling .
A man in an orange vest works near a blue-draped fence and black and orange wires .
Two workers are building a skyscraper .
A skater is in the air and doing a trick with skyscrapers in the background .
A young boy has a snake draped over his shoulders .
Blue and white drapes hanging down .

A male singer , dressed in a long purple pea coat , holding an electric guitar , singing into a microphone , while a male in sunglasses and wearing headphones , plays drums , with purple drapery hanging in the background .
A man with dark hair and mustache talks on his cellphone with a concerned look on his face , while looking at grapes and citrus fruit in front of him .
A female trapeze artist hangs by her foot in an aerial performance .
Here is a picture of a construction crew getting ready to go to work on a skyscraper .
A man in a white and red shirt is sitting on a brown couch in front of a white refrigerator and floral drapes .
A woman with a white bonnet sit in a chair next to a brick wall with a bolt of fabric resting on her white apron draped lap .
A man walked across a street holding a basket on top of his head filled with fruit and vegetables with one hand , while holding bags of grapes in his right hand .
A woman rapels through barren treetops .
Very blue water with skyscraper buildings on the shore and a group of people in a canoes with paddles .
A woman with a white towel draped across her is drinking clear liquid from a jar while sitting in front of a door that is slightly open .
An elephant draped in red , blue and gold fabric walking on a stone path .
A female athlete runs with a scraped knee .
A balding man in a khaki parka stands near the Bryant Park Newsstand on a cold , wet , cloudy day ; skyscrapers fade into the foggy background .
A middle-aged man taking a rest after his trapeze act in the circus .
A group of four people watch while a man wearing a gray shirt grabs hold of a trapeze bar attached to a tree branch .
Many people sit at desks with computers , in front of windows with geometric patterned drapes .
Lots of runners with numbers running past a grape field on an asphalt path with some writing on it .
Three people are standing at a fence looking at a skyscraper filled city while one looks through a binocular scope .
A woman in a skirt and green t-shirt has her arm draped over the shoulder of a younger woman in a white skirt and orange t-shirt .
Two young boys are smiling while sitting next to an organized fruit cart that holds apples , grapes , plums , and various other fruits .
Three people on a walk down a cement path beside a field of wildflowers with skyscrapers in the background .
Three men in blue hard hats are on the tops of telephone poles working on the wires of one with a tall wedge topped skyscraper in the background .
A man with a mustache and turban draped around his head is situated in a tree with a tool .
A blond-headed child gets their first haircut while sitting in a blue car with a yellow drape while their hair is blow-dried .
A young man is getting his haircut by another man with a towel draped across his shoulders .
A man wearing rubber gloves and boots inspects a large piece of cloth that 's draped over a wet , stone structure .
A young man in a green shirt is jumping with his skateboard over three steps in front of a skyscraper .
Man in striped polo shirt looks on as a man suspended on a swing cleans the windows of a skyscraper .
Woman wearing USA colors , holding a USA Flag , riding a horse draped in the USA Flag in an arena .
A barber and a seated client in a barber shop hung with bright , flower-patterned draperies .
The firemen and women wearing blue gloves have finished working on a person who is lying on ground bandaged and draped in a blue blanket .
A shot of trees with the sky scrapers overlooking the view .
A young woman wearing a black shirt , blue jeans , black hat , glasses , and a blue sweater draped around her shoulders , walks holding an umbrella to protect her from the sun .
A trapeze artist sits peacefully suspended by circus trapeze ring .
A trapeze artist dangles from fabric in front of a crowd of onlookers in a park .
A man with glasses and a mustache scrapes paint off the outside of a windowsill .
A person walking by a window with the drapes closed .
A crowd of people stand in the background of a set of tables draped in white with various used toys set upon it .
A group of people is on a ferry headed toward a city with skyscrapers .
Baby sitting by a fruit bowl while holding a grape in his or her little hand .
There is a large gathering of people , with two men in white shirts and one with a flag draped over him in the front and a man in a black shirt on a cellphone next to them .
A child with a blue shirt and red sweater draped over his shoulders is looking over a concrete fence .
A view of a park during the daytime with large skyscrapers in the background .
Gowned medical professionals observe surgery on a partially-draped patient .
A person with blue jeans and a white shirt is standing on a sidewalk with something red draped over their shoulder .

On a city street , several people are present , many of them talking and wearing casual outfits , including a man with white pants at the front of the picture who is walking with his back to the camera with a Canadian flag opened and draped down his back .

A woman is walking away from the viewer , she is wearing white clothing and has a handbag draped on her left shoulder ; her upper back is exposed , showing a tattoo of a winged creature( possibly a fairy ) .
Women in pink hat stands next to a faux Ostrich outside while a rainbow flag is draped from balcony on nearby building .
A gentleman selling banana 's and grapes .
A man walking through a large city with skyscrapers .
Tall skyscrapers , a green truck and a woman in a yellow shirt .

It is nighttime and 3 men that are trapeze artists performing simultaneously , one upside down on a motorcycle , one hanging from a bar underneath the first one and one at the bottom hanging upside down by his knees .
A young woman gives a pink-draped man a haircut .
A busy city with cars and people with a giant skyscraper .
Brunette female wearing yellow bikini top , has large tattoo inked across her lower back , and a blue towel draped across her right shoulder .
Two females stand together at night in front of a brightly lit skyscraper .
A couple embracing outside a downtown train station , the female 's black designer handbag is draped across her lover 's shoulder .
Three men draped in orange , possibly Hare Krishna monks , walk down a street .
A woman with a red and white piece of clothing draped over her arm rides a pink cruiser-style bicycle down a boardwalk .

A bunch of people are mingling in a fair where there booths with the flags of countries draped over the walls .
A woman draped in and odd dress , reads to the audience .

People riding a tour bus seeing the big skyscrapers .
